answers.answer: You drink some juice....they draw your blood an hour later. It's to see if you've acquired gestational diabetes

It's for gestational diabetes. They will draw your blood before you drink the juice, then you will wait for an hour or two,  they will draw your blood 2 more times. And that's it.You can't eat or drink after 10pm, the night before the test. The only thing you can have is water.

Nonishy.....wow they drew your blood that much? How come they drew it before? That's crazy....I drank the juice....they did a blood draw once an hour later...my glucose level was normal and I left. Lol crazy
I can't eat anything after midnight tonight and the office doesn't open till 8 in the morning and I can not have food or water nothing at all
Thank you for telling me what it is. Hm I'm going to be starving tomorrow. My baby makes me super hungry all the time
I know. I got mine first thing at 8am so I can eat right aftet
Me and my poor baby are going to be starving. The other women said it takes up to an hour

You can eat and drink the first time, but if the blood sugar is to high they make you do it the second time and that's when you can't eat or drink,  at least that's what i had done with my first 2 pregnancies... good luck, that drink is soooo disgusting. ...
You can eat and drink unless your doctor says you can't.
Before the test just not during.**
I can't eat or drink anything at all my doctor said so.

question: I went to my doctor today and the nurse said that I need to get work done for that tomorrow morning. What is glucose testing for?
title: glucose testing
